note.original: (rāgassa bhikkhave abhiññāya tayo dhammā bhāvetabbā. katame tayo? savitakkasavicāro samādhi, avitakkavicāramatto samādhi, avitakkaavicāro samādhi. rāgassa bhikkhave abhiññāya ime tayo dhammā bhāvetabbā.) etthantare pāṭho katthaci dissati, aṭṭhakathāyaṃ passitabbo
( ) etthantare pāṭho syā. kaṃ. ka. potthakesu na dissati
imā uddānagāthāyo sī. syā. kaṃ. pī. potthakesu na dissanti
